solution_line_template: In the final 40 seconds, the Fireflies scored seven 3-point baskets to improve their score by {points_per_3pt}*{fireflies_3pt_baskets}=<<{fireflies_3pt_baskets}*{points_per_3pt}={fireflies_points_final_seconds}>>{fireflies_points_final_seconds} points.

Thus, the Fireflies final total was {fireflies_initial_score}+{fireflies_points_final_seconds}=<<{fireflies_initial_score}+{fireflies_points_final_seconds}={fireflies_final_score}>>{fireflies_final_score} points.

In the final 40 seconds, the hornets scored an additional two 2-point baskets to improve their score by {hornets_2pt_baskets}*{points_per_2pt}=<<{hornets_2pt_baskets}*{points_per_2pt}={hornets_points_final_seconds}>>{hornets_points_final_seconds} points.
Thus, the Hornets final total was {hornets_initial_score}+{hornets_points_final_seconds}=<<{hornets_initial_score}+{hornets_points_final_seconds}={hornets_final_score}>>{hornets_final_score} points.
The final difference in points between the two teams was {fireflies_final_score}-{hornets_final_score}=<<{fireflies_final_score}-{hornets_final_score}={point_difference}>>{point_difference} points.
